pullrequest.title: Allow putting GUI headers in src/gui and move resources into src/gui

content.raw:
> I'm not sure why this would be a breaking change. 

I thought you meant that everywhere where the `.hh` was included, we would now need to also include `moc_*.cc`.

>  the example you linked should work just fine

You're right, I just tried it.

>  This is a limitation of CMake AUTOMOC in that it doesn't autogenerate the moc files for included headers that are not in the same directory as the containing .cc file.

Ah this may be the reason we were using `QT5_WRAP_CPP` and passing `gui_sources` across scopes.

---

Sorry for the noise, this LGTM
content.html:
I'm not sure why this would be a breaking change.

I thought you meant that everywhere where the .hh was included, we would now need to also include moc_*.cc.

the example you linked should work just fine

You're right, I just tried it.

This is a limitation of CMake AUTOMOC in that it doesn't autogenerate the moc files for included headers that are not in the same directory as the containing .cc file.

Ah this may be the reason we were using QT5_WRAP_CPP and passing gui_sources across scopes.

Sorry for the noise, this LGTM
